# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

As the Rhetorical-Linguistic Operating System (RLOS) is currently in Phase 0 (Foundation & Infrastructure), there are no stable release versions yet. All development branches should be considered unstable.

## Reporting a Vulnerability

The RLOS team takes security seriously. If you have discovered a security vulnerability in the codebase, we appreciate your help in disclosing it to us in a responsible manner.

### Where to Report

Please do not report security vulnerabilities through public GitHub issues.

Instead, please report vulnerabilities by emailing: **architecture@rlos.org**

### What to Include

In your report, please include:

- A description of the vulnerability.
- Steps to reproduce the issue.
- Potential impact of the vulnerability.
- Any proof-of-concept code or screenshots.

### Response

We will acknowledge receipt of your report and will work to verify and resolve the issue promptly.
